title: Home
text:
Professional Skills for Data Analytics is designed to enhance the professional capacity of students in data analytics. This module provides a comprehensive grounding in essential skills required for data literacy, bolstering existing skills and framing elements of best practice standards. It covers a range of topics including an introduction to R programming, an introduction to traditional statistical analysis and visualization, the creation of GitHub webpages to document and communicate analyses, and the use of Git and Markdown for reproducible practice.  ## Module content

R Language: R language
Tidy data: Tidy data
Markdown and Github: Markdown and Github
Statistical reporting: Statistical reporting

title: Home
text:
Harper Adams Data Science

This module is a part of the MSc in Data Science for Global Agriculture, Food, and Environment at Harper Adams University, led by Ed Harris.
